before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"5rf6q","text":"Bead preparation:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"17kaj","text":"Both types of Cytiva Carboxylate SpeedBeads are shipped at 50 mg/mL concentration (5% solids) in water with 0.05% sodium azide. It is a good idea to combine the beads and aliquot them for long term storage at   . Preparing aliquots of stock beads avoids excess handling of the main bottles and minimizes the risk of contamination.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":209,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fih74","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dqa8e","text":"To do this: Let both stock beads equilibrate to room temperature for 30 minutes. If the beads have settled during storage they should be resuspended by inversion or gentle vortexing until no solid bead mass is visible at the bottom of the bottle. Combine both types of beads into a 1:1 ratio, and aliquot into  ,  , and    volumes, store at   until further use.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":310,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":313,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":321,"length":1},{"key":4,"offset":341,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"60882F10EE7711ED8E344FB5C8DA1970","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"FD973EE0EE7711ED8E344FB5C8DA1970","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":5}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"F501D3D0EE7711ED8E344FB5C8DA1970","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":5}},"3":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"100","error":false,"guid":"EB075A80EE7711ED8E344FB5C8DA1970","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":5}},"4":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"91CB4490EE7711ED8E344FB5C8DA1970","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"ahko","text":"SP3 bead preparation of samples for MS analysis","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8fkiq","text":"Compatible with a wide range of buffer and detergent types.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"dh7ev","text":"pH: SP3 works in the pH range of   to  .","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":33,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":38,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6m2v7","text":"Protein samples should be ultrasonicated to remove nucleic acid. DNA if in sample will coat the SP3 beads, causing their aggregation, and is best avoided. If ultrasonication is not available, use Benzonase to shear DNA.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bha7s","text":"Bead concentration during binding: A bead to protein ratio of  5:1 to 10:1 is recommended. For example, if processing   of protein, add ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":35}],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":118,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fds87","text":"Sample concentration: The binding capacity of SP3 beads provides a flexible clean-up format across a range of protein and peptide concentrations (10 μg/mL to 5 mg/mL), as long as the concentration of beads is adjusted as described above.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":22}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"25o9d","text":"Sample handling: The use of 200 μL gel loading pipette tips for sample aspiration is recommended.  Care should be taken to gently aspirate supernatant to avoid dislodging protein or peptide-bound beads from the magnet. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a83ls","text":"QC: Aliquots of the load, flow-through, washes, and bound bead: sample may be processed by SDS PAGE and visualised with Colloidal Coomassie or SIlver staining to determine binding efficiency of the sample to beads, and if wash steps are sufficient.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"ph","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"AA259BE0EE7111ED8E344FB5C8DA1970","id":0,"number":"7.0"}},"1":{"type":"ph","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"A0B1B7B0EE7111ED8E344FB5C8DA1970","id":0,"number":"8.5"}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"20","error":false,"guid":"E2FE38A0EE7111ED8E344FB5C8DA1970","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":4}}}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"a2rhs","text":"Protein lysates, reduced and alkylated, and protein concentration estimated, in 5% SDS lysis buffer in 50mM TEAB.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"95sqs","text":"SDS lysis buffer - Sodium dodecyl sulfate (SDS) (Sigma-Aldrich Cat. #L6026) in 100 mM TEAB (SIgma-LAdrich Cat. # T7408), pH 7.5 – prepare 10% stock solution and store at room temperature for up to 2 years.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"16o4o","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"95b58","text":"SP3 protein cleanup and enzymatic digestion","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":43}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b831o","text":"·Cytiva SpeedBeads (Cat. #GE45152105050250 ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5nktc","text":"and ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4cjd","text":"Cytiva SpeedBeads (Cat. #GE65152105050250).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cqkvj","text":"·Ethanol (EtOH) HPLC/Spectrophotomeric grade 200 proof (Sigma-Aldrich Cat. #459828).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1cdkb","text":"·Trypsin (Sequencing Grade, Promega Cat. #V5113).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4hv13","text":"·Ammonium Bicarbonate (AmBic) (Sigma Aldrich BioUltra - \u003e 99.5% Cat. #09830) – prepare 100 mM buffer fresh.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"abp5v","text":"·Ultrapure filtered water, or LC-MS grade water.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1r4jc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"m6ef","text":"Equipment","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"125ua","text":"·Magnetic stand such as the Cell Signalling 7017S 6-tube magnetic separation rack for 1.5 mL microcentrifuge tubes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a9c7f","text":"·Bath sonicator.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4uhk9","text":"·Microcentrifuge tubes that demonstrate low binding of proteins and peptides and that can also tolerate high organic solvent concentrations without leaching plasticizers. Sarstedt™ 1.5 mL screw cap microcentrifuge tubes (Cat. #72.692) were used for all steps in this protocol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6q3ab","text":"·Heater / Mixer platform (e.g. Eppendorf™ thermomixer).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bkbp5","text":"·Centrifuge for pelleting cellular debris in the range of   e.g. Eppendorf 5425 or equivalent.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":59,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":58,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"af29a","text":"·pH paper strips e.g. GE healthcare Whatman pH strips pH 0–14 (#11375254) for checking sample pH throughout the protocol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"14000","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"BF7A5BBDEE7411EDBEB10A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}}}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6sb4t","text":"Briefly vortex the 1:1 bead mixture and place the tube on a magnetic stand for two minutes to collect the beads. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":19,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"est2h","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dqnmj","text":"Check the pH of the sample is in the range of   to   for optimal binding by measuring an aliquot on pH paper.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":46,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":51,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"48tj3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"ph","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"51CC07A0EE7A11ED8E344FB5C8DA1970","id":0,"number":"7.0"}},"1":{"type":"ph","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"4A1FC410EE7A11ED8E344FB5C8DA1970","id":0,"number":"8.5"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fja9","text":"Add washed beads (prepared as above) to the samples in a ratio of   of beads to   of protein and briefly vortex.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":66,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":80,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8jr5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5-10","error":false,"guid":"3D6DE1C0EF1011ED8E344FB5C8DA1970","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":4}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"3A084890EF1011ED8E344FB5C8DA1970","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":4}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5rfru","text":"Immediately add a volume of   ethanol to the samples to obtain a 50% final concentration to initiate protein binding to the beads.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":65,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":28,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bp77l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"100","error_concentration":false,"guid":"8991E020EF0F11ED8E344FB5C8DA1970","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":206}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"14pmo","text":"Vortex the samples to mix but ensure that beads are not stuck on the sides of the tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4trk3","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5s67j","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"6rksc","text":"The protein-bead mixture will be sticky at this stage. Avoid touching the beads to minimize sample loss.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5p1gi","text":"Incubate the samples on a room temperature mixer platform for  at  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":62,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":66,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"916cu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"9275AE00EE7A11ED8E344FB5C8DA1970","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"1000","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"8CA2BE50EE7A11ED8E344FB5C8DA1970","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":-1,"unit":33}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"69m7l","text":"Remove the samples from the mixer, centrifuge them for   and place them on the magnetic stand for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":55,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":98,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4su5s","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":2,"guid":"97A0EC00EE7A11ED8E344FB5C8DA1970","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":120,"guid":"AF4C2FE0EE7A11ED8E344FB5C8DA1970","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"57bag","text":"Transfer the supernatants to a clean Sarstedt tube. This is the \"flow-through\" fraction.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":64,"length":14}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bcdd9","text":"Centrifuge the samples  briefly for two seconds on a mini centrifuge and place back on the magnetic stand for  \t","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":110,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7l0db","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":120,"guid":"955DEEF0EE7C11ED8E344FB5C8DA1970","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ce5id","text":"Remove the supernatants and save in a separate Sarstedt tubes. Label these wash 01.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":75,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b1mc5","text":"Repeat the wash steps a further three times, and transfer the supernatants to clean Sarstedt tubes, labelled wash 02, wash 03, and wash 04.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":32,"length":5},{"style":"bold","offset":109,"length":7},{"style":"bold","offset":118,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c5o6c","text":"For the final wash (wash 04) - perform this by transferring the resuspended beads in   ethanol to a new, labelled tube. Stand for   on a magnetic rack, and remove the supernatant, the beads are now ready for digestion. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":85,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":130,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9f5b","text":"(This is a critical step, because residual detergent on the sides of the tube and even beads may be transferred to the downstream steps). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":138}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"64o6i","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"80","error_concentration":false,"guid":"638B87F0EF0F11ED8E344FB5C8DA1970","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":206}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":120,"guid":"5AD7BF70EF0F11ED8E344FB5C8DA1970","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9nal4","text":"After the final wash, air dry the beads for   to remove as much ethanol as possible.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":44,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7p63b","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":30,"guid":"E31C6E00EE7C11ED8E344FB5C8DA1970","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"blf3l","text":"Resuspend the beads in   of   ammonium bicarbonate buffer ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":23,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":28,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6469a","text":"(This is a critical step, because residual detergent on the sides of the tube and even beads may be transferred to the downstream steps). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"25","error":false,"guid":"5EB711F0EF0E11ED8E344FB5C8DA1970","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"100","error_concentration":false,"guid":"ECDA5380EE7C11ED8E344FB5C8DA1970","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d8tsf","text":"Add Promega™ sequencing grade trypsin in a 1:20 enzyme-to substrate ratio to each sample, and digest at      on an Eppendorf thermomixer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":104,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":106,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"agj1k","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"39A5C000EE7D11ED8E344FB5C8DA1970","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":120,"guid":"4041CC10EE7D11ED8E344FB5C8DA1970","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dpv2k","text":"After 16 to 18 hours, add the tubes to a magnetic stand for   . Carefully remove the supernatant, and transfer to a clean, labelled tube. Add an additional   volume of   ammonium bicarbonate buffer to the beads, briefly vortex, and allow to stand for    on a magnetic rack. Carefully transfer the supernatant to the same labelled sample tube, to create a pooled sample. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":60,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":156,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":168,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":252,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5b6vm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":120,"guid":"2895038AEE7E11ED9F400A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"60","error":false,"guid":"0F820D90EF1011ED8E344FB5C8DA1970","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"2":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"100","error_concentration":false,"guid":"4A385E37EE7E11ED9F400A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}},"3":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":120,"guid":"5BED473FEE7E11ED9F400A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6pd83","text":"Add ultrapure water at a volume corresponding to 5 to 10 times the initial volume of mixed beads.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":49,"length":13}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c1tsk","text":"Vortex the beads for   and place on a magnetic stand for   to collect the beads. Carefully aspirate and discard the wash buffer with a gel loading tip.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":21,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":57,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"b4uvt","text":"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":10,"guid":"63E3A430EE7911ED8E344FB5C8DA1970","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":120,"guid":"4960AF40EE7911ED8E344FB5C8DA1970","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e8169","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"avdbr","text":"Repeat the wash steps a further two times.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6nqj9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ao08v","text":"Resuspend the beads with ultrapure water at a final concentration of  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":69,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"74rj3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"10","error_concentration":false,"guid":"AD906B90EE7911ED8E344FB5C8DA1970","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":205}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9lqv7","text":"Wash the beads by adding a volume of   ethanol corresponding to at least twice the initial sample volume and vortex for  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":37,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":120,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"f48ek","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"80","error_concentration":false,"guid":"84224620EF0F11ED8E344FB5C8DA1970","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":206}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":30,"guid":"800C5280EE7C11ED8E344FB5C8DA1970","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ll9b","text":"Do not vortex the beads at this stage. Instead, place the tubes on a floating rack and sonicate in a water batch for   to resuspend them.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":117,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":120,"guid":"C86D4B2BEE7D11ED9F400A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9ad9r","text":"Centrifuge the peptide for 10 minutes at  , and proceed to R3 desalting (see https://www.protocols.io/view/96-well-plate-r3-desalt-and-clean-up-protocol-for-dm6gpbnqdlzp/v1 )","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":41,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":77,"length":95}],"data":{}},{"key":"bmv70","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"14000","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"9810EF10EE7E11ED8E344FB5C8DA1970","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"B0DFFD3EEE7E11ED9F400A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.protocols.io/view/96-well-plate-r3-desalt-and-clean-up-protocol-for-dm6gpbnqdlzp/v1"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6r3au","text":"Washed beads may be stored at   for up to one month.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":30,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8oeep","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"23A240D0EF0E11ED8E344FB5C8DA1970","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}
